## Overview

# UIDatePickerStyle

**Enumeration**

Styles that determine the appearance of a date picker.

## Declaration

```swift
enum UIDatePickerStyle
```

## Overview

A date picker style determines how your app displays the date picker value and its editor. For instance, a date picker with a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDatePicker/datePickerMode] of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDatePicker/Mode/dateAndTime] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDatePicker/datePickerStyle] of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDatePickerStyle/compact] displays the date picker’s value as a label that the user can tap to view a calendar-style editor. On the other hand, the same date picker using the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDatePickerStyle/inline] style displays a view that lets the user edit the value without having to tap the label shown in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDatePickerStyle/compact] style.

## Styles

- **UIDatePickerStyle.automatic**: A style indicating that the system picks the concrete style based on the current platform and date picker mode.
- **UIDatePickerStyle.compact**: A style indicating that the date picker displays as a label that when tapped displays a calendar-style editor.
- **UIDatePickerStyle.inline**: A style indicating that the date pickers displays as an inline, editable field.
- **UIDatePickerStyle.wheels**: A style indicating that the date picker displays as a wheel picker.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Configuring the date picker style

- **datePickerStyle**: The current style of the date picker.
- **preferredDatePickerStyle**: The preferred style of the date picker.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
